snippet: Several top leagues have crowned their champions, and the rest will do so in the next week before clubs send their best players home to pack for Brazil.
abstract: Quick look at the status of the title races in Europe’s big-five soccer leagues; several top leagues have crowned their champions, and the rest will do so before they send their best players home to pack for 2014 World Cup in Brazil.
lead_paragraph: Several top leagues have crowned their champions, and the rest will do so in the next week before clubs send their best players home to pack for Brazil.

headline.print_headline: League Races Reach Early End in Europe
